entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:17 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 12:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -26.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: NNW 52 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
